testsuite.name: Saucedemo Login
testsuite.system-out:
Feature: Saucedemo Login
Scenario: Successful login with valid credentials # src/test/resources/features/login.feature:3 Given user navigates to saucedemo login # LoginSteps.openLoginPage() When user enters username "standard_user" # LoginSteps.enterUsername(String) And user enters password "secret_sauce" # LoginSteps.enterPassword(String) And user submits login # LoginSteps.submitLogin() Then user should see inventory page # LoginSteps.checkInventory()
Scenario: Login fails with wrong password # src/test/resources/features/login.feature:10 Given user navigates to saucedemo login # LoginSteps.openLoginPage() When user enters username "standard_user" # LoginSteps.enterUsername(String) And user enters password "wrongpass" # LoginSteps.enterPassword(String) And user submits login # LoginSteps.submitLogin() Then error message should be shown # LoginSteps.checkError()
Scenario: Login fails with empty username # src/test/resources/features/login.feature:17 Given user navigates to saucedemo login # LoginSteps.openLoginPage() When user enters username "" # LoginSteps.enterUsername(String) And user enters password "secret_sauce" # LoginSteps.enterPassword(String) And user submits login # LoginSteps.submitLogin() Then error message should be shown # LoginSteps.checkError()
